title: Snowdrift at Bleath Gill
creator_credit: British Transport Films, Edgar H. Anstey and Kenneth J. Fairbairn
brief_description: A freight train becomes snowbound in the West-Morland hills in Northern England. The Motive Power, Operating and Engineering Departments of British Transport go to work with snow-ploughs to reach the trapped train. Working through the night the team dig clear, and thaw out moving parts, and finally two engines help to clear the line.
